about_the_game: Nuts is the next Strand Type enviroment with a clicker experience, in which you click things! In Nuts you tap the nut to gain even more nuts! Every 2 and 17 hours, your nuts drop. Each nut is made by the community in discord.
detailed_description: Nuts is the next Strand Type enviroment with a clicker experience, in which you click things! In Nuts you tap the nut to gain even more nuts! Every 2 and 17 hours, your nuts drop. Each nut is made by the community in discord.
name: Nuts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Nuts is the next Strand Type enviroment with a clicker experience, in which you click things! In Nuts you tap the nut to gain even more nuts! Every 2 and 17 hours, your nuts drop. Each nut is made by the community in discord.
